item.title: My Favorite Quotes!
item.author: Author

item.title: What Does It Mean to Be a Passionate Engineer?
item.author: Author
item.description: Let’s Be Honest Although every engineer claims to be passionate and lifelong learners, few of them really are. What Is Passion? What is passion? It’s not something we only talk about during interviews or presentations. Instead, it’s something we do, some choices we make, and some paths we take. More specifically, it’s about: still searching for a better solution even when you already have a suboptimal one that works for now.
